categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: During the Great Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, a twenty-eight-year conflict spanning from 3681 BBY to 3653 BBY, a battle occurred on the moon Yavin 4. The Jedi Knight Warren Sedoru was among the Jedi and Republic forces who fought in the battle, though he was critically injured during the fighting.

The battle at Yavin 4 was first mentioned in the in-game Codex entry for Warren Sedoru in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011.
